An executable function or script.

args Object
Properties

invoke(argsopt, optionsopt)

Invoke the function or script.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
args Array | Object <optional>
 Function arguments or prepared statement parameters.
options Object <optional>
 Query options. instead of an array of results.

Name Type Description
